title: Slow cooker pasta Bolognese
ingredients: ['500g minced steak', '1 tsp minced garlic', '1 onion, diced', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 large carrot, diced', '500g jar chunky vegetable pasta sauce', '400g tin diced tomatoes', '1 tbsp beef stock powder', '500ml water', '1 tsp mixed herbs', 'black pepper to taste', '160g rotini pasta', 'Parmesan cheese']
